LanguageData.MessageSiegersAssaulting: Sieging {0} from {1} are assaulting the colony.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersKidnapping: {0} bacardıqları qədər əsir götürüb getməyə qərar verdilər.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersStealing: {0} əllərinə keçəni oğurlayıb getməyə qərar verdilər.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersSatisfiedLeaving: {1} verdikləri zərər bəs etdi onlara gedirlər.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsDangerousTemperature: {0} təhlükəli temperatura görə xəritəni tərk edirlər.
LanguageData.MessageWornApparelDeterioratedAway: {0} worn by {1} deteriorated away to nothing.
LanguageData.MessageNeedBeaconToTradeWithShip: Gəmilərlə alış-veriş etmək üçün orbital ticarət mayakı lazımdır.\n\n Mayak elektrik ilə işləyir.
LanguageData.MessageOutOfNearbyShellsFor: {0} {1} üçün boşda olan mərmi tapa bilmədi.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalsGoPsychoHunted: Xəbərdarlıq: {0} zərər versən hücüm edə bilər.

LanguageData.MessageRecruitSuccess: {1} {0} tərəfindən bizə qoşulmağa razı salındı ({2} şans).
LanguageData.MessageTameAndNameSuccess: {1} {0} tərəfindən əhilləşdirildi. ({2} şans) və [PAWN_objective] {3} adını qoydu.
LanguageData.MessageColonyNotEnoughSilver: Ticarət üçün yetəri qədər gümüş yoxdur.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHaulable: Must designate haulable items. Some items are always haulable and can't be designated.
LanguageData.MessageAlreadyInStorage: This is already in storage and will be moved to high-priority storage as necessary.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateStrippable: Must designate corpse or downed character with strippable apparel.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateSlaughterable: Must designate tame animal that belongs to the colony.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateOpenable: Must designate full graves or containers.
LanguageData.MessageTooLowMedCare: Operation requires {0} or better, but {1}'s current medical care mode is "{2}".
LanguageData.MessageInvoluntarySleep: {0} has collapsed due to extreme exhaustion.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinor: {0} has failed in a minor way while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureCatastroph: {0} has failed catastrophically while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidiculous: {0} has failed in a ridiculous way while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureFatal: {0} has committed a fatal errol while operating on {1} because of the special challenges of: {2}
LanguageData.MessagePawnExitMapRelationsGain: {0} xəritədən sağlam şəkildə çıxdığı üçün, {1} ilə olan əlaqələrimiz {2} qalxdı.
LanguageData.MessageNoHandlerSkilledEnough: No handler can tame {0} (requires level {1} in {2}, best handler {3} has {4}).
LanguageData.MessageHiveReproduced: A bug hive has reproduced itself.
LanguageData.MessageSocialFight: {0} və {1} bir-biri ilə {2} buna görə savaşdırlar.
LanguageData.MessageNewMarriageCeremony: Kolonistlər {0} və {1} evliliklərini qeyd etmək üçün toplanırlar.
LanguageData.MessageNewlyMarried: {0} və {1} evləndilər. Kolonistlər bunu qeyd edirlər.
LanguageData.MessageNewBondRelationNewName: {0} and {1} have formed a bond. {0} has named [PAWN_objective] {2}.
LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalMentalBreak: {0} has a mental break because of {1}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageNamedBondedAnimalMentalBreak: {0} named {1} has a mental break because of {2}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalsMentalBreak: {0} animals have a mental break because of {1}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageShipChunkDrop: A chunk of a spacecraft has fallen from space and landed nearby.
LanguageData.MessageCannotSellItemsReason: Bəzi əşyalar alver üçün istifadə edilə bilməz, SƏBƏB:
LanguageData.MessageConstructionFailed: {1} {0} düzəldə bilmədi. Qaynaqlarımızı boş-boşuna heyif etdi.
LanguageData.MessageNoLongerOnTargetedInsultingSpree: {0} is no longer on an insulting spree against {1}.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToSendCaravanBecausePawnLos: Failed to send the caravan because one of the colonists, prisoners or animals has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationPaused: The caravan formation process will continue when everyone recovers from a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationUnpaused: Your colonists will now continue forming a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanMemberHasExtremeMentalBrea: One of the caravan members has a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageMaxPlanetCoveragePerformanceWarni: Warning: It can take a very long time to generate an entire planet.
LanguageData.MessagePlantDiedOfRot_LeftUnharvested: {0} biçilmədiyi üçün qala-qala çürüyüb xarab oldu.
LanguageData.MessagePawnLeftMapAndCreatedCaravan: {0} has left the area and formed a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageAmbushVictory: Victory! In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
LanguageData.MessageRescueeJoined: Since you rescued [PAWN_objective], {0} has joined your group!
LanguageData.MessageAttackedCaravanIsNowHostile: Because you attacked a caravan of {0}, this faction is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.MessageFactionPawnCrushed: {0} lost people to a roof collapse. Faction relation: {1}
LanguageData.MessageTransportersNotAdjacent: All pod launchers connected to the selected transport pods must be adjacent.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_Transpor: The loading process has been canceled because one of the transport pods has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_FuelingP: The loading process has been canceled because one of the pod launchers has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadingProcessStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned items into the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndLost: Your transport pods have arrived, but since there were no colonists inside, the contents are lost.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndAddedToCar: Your transport pods have arrived. The contents have been added to your caravan.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToLoadTransportersBecauseCo: The loading process has been canceled because one of the colonists has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageFinishedLoadingTransporters: Your colonists have finished loading the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsDestinationIsTooFar: Each pod launcher would need at least {0}x chemfuel to send transport pods that far.
LanguageData.MessageCantBanishLastColonist: You can't banish the last colonist.
LanguageData.MessageSlaughteringBondedAnimal: Because they are bonded, slaughtering {0} will make {1} unhappy.
LanguageData.MessageSelectOwnBaseToFormCaravan: To form a caravan, select your own colony or a site where you have people.
LanguageData.MessageScreenResTooSmallForUIScale: At this resolution and UI scale, the game interface would not fit on-screen. Please reduce UI scale or increase resolution.
LanguageData.MessageYouHaveToReformCaravanNow: You have to reform the caravan now. Everyone left behind will be abandoned.
LanguageData.MessageSelfTendUnsatisfied: To self-tend, {0} must also be assigned to Doctor work.
LanguageData.MessageCannotSelfTendEver: {0} is incapable of doing Doctor work, and so cannot ever self-tend.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseUnreachable: It's not possible to reach this tile from the last waypoint.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseLimit: You can't add more than {0} waypoints.
LanguageData.MessageCantDoExecutionBecauseNoWardenCap: None of your wardens is capable of violence. The execution won't be performed.
LanguageData.MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoMoreEnemies: You have defeated all enemies. In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed.
LanguageData.MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoEnemiesInit: In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
LanguageData.MessagePawnResurrected: {0} has been brought back to life!
LanguageData.MessageFailedToRescueRelative: You have failed to rescue {0}. This will make {1} sad.
LanguageData.MessageRescuedRelative: You have rescued {0}. This will make {1} happy.
LanguageData.MessagePrisonerRescued: You have rescued [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] has joined your colony.
LanguageData.MessageTornadoLeftMap: The tornado has left the map.
LanguageData.MessageWarningCavePlantsExposedToLight: Warning: {0} cannot live when exposed to light.
LanguageData.MessageTargetedTantrumChangedTarget: {0} couldn't reach {1} so [PAWN_pronoun] decided to redirect [PAWN_possessive] anger at {2}.
